results.title: Efficacy and safety of metformin in pregnant women with polycystic ovary syndrome: a systematic review with meta-analysis of randomized and non-randomized controlled trials.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ can significantly reduce @<m>DISEASE_Obesity_Maternal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079262 @@@maternal@@@ complications.

results.title: Effect of metformin in addition to dietary and lifestyle advice for pregnant women who are overweight or obese: the GRoW randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: We aimed to assess the effects on @<m>DISEASE_Obesity_Maternal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079262 @@@maternal@@@ and infant outcomes of antenatal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ given in addition to dietary and lifestyle advice among @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ and @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@.

results.title: Effect of metformin on maternal and fetal outcomes in obese pregnant women (EMPOWaR): a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial
results.text_hl: We aimed to establish whether the @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitising drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ improves @<m>DISEASE_Obesity_Maternal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079262 @@@maternal@@@ and fetal outcomes in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: The use of oral hypoglycaemic agents in pregnancy.
results.text_hl: Studies of the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@gestational diabetes@@@ show at least equivalent neonatal outcomes, while reporting reductions in @DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal hypoglycaemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Obesity_Maternal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000079262 @@@maternal hypoglycaemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ and improved treatment satisfaction.
